tasks.title: Audit Existing Documentation and Scripts
tasks.description: Perform a comprehensive audit of all documentation files and scripts to identify redundancies, outdated content, and structural issues.
tasks.details: Use automated tools (e.g., markdownlint v0.32+, custom Node.js scripts) to scan the docs/ directory for duplicate files, outdated references, and inconsistent formatting. Document findings in a spreadsheet for tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify audit completeness by cross-referencing all files in the repository against the audit report. Spot-check for missed duplicates and outdated content.

tasks.title: Backup Documentation and Scripts
tasks.description: Create a secure backup of all documentation and scripts before making any changes.
tasks.details: Use git tags and archive the current docs/ and scripts/ directories to a secure location (e.g., cloud storage, S3 bucket). Ensure backup includes file metadata and version history.
tasks.testStrategy: Restore backup in a test environment and verify integrity and completeness of all files.

tasks.title: Plan Documentation Structure and Migration
tasks.description: Design the new documentation hierarchy and migration strategy based on audit findings.
tasks.details: Draft a new docs/ structure in a planning document. Use diagrams (e.g., Mermaid.js) to visualize hierarchy. Define migration steps and assign responsibilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Review plan with stakeholders for completeness and clarity. Validate structure against PRD requirements.

tasks.title: Merge Redundant Documentation Files
tasks.description: Consolidate overlapping documentation into authoritative sources.
tasks.details: Use diff tools (e.g., Meld, VSCode Compare) to merge CMS_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md and IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md. Remove duplicates, preserve unique content, and resolve conflicts. Repeat for compliance and testing docs.
tasks.testStrategy: Peer review merged documents for completeness and accuracy. Ensure no critical information is lost.

tasks.title: Update Technical Content to Current Stack
tasks.description: Modernize all technical examples and references to match the September 2025 stack.
tasks.details: Update React examples to React 19 (remove manual memoization, use new hooks), TanStack Query v5 (use isPending, throwOnError), Tauri 2.1+ (universal entry point), and TypeScript patterns. Use Prettier v3+ for code formatting.
tasks.testStrategy: Run code examples in isolated environments (e.g., CodeSandbox, local test repo) to verify correctness and compatibility.

tasks.title: Consolidate Compliance Documentation
tasks.description: Merge Quebec Law 25 and HIPAA documentation into a unified compliance section.
tasks.details: Create docs/compliance/overview.md with consolidated content. Add quick-reference guides and update compliance testing procedures. Use markdown tables for comparison and clarity.
tasks.testStrategy: Legal/compliance review for completeness and accuracy. Validate against latest regulatory requirements.
